## Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
#libraries
library(haven)
library(caret)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(dlookr)
```

```{r}
#import dataset
brfss_2023 <- read_xpt("/Users/sashalibolt/Downloads/LLCP2023.XPT ")
```

```{r}
#create data quality report 
brfss_dqr <- diagnose(brfss_2023)
```

```{r}
#identify what has ore than 10% missing
high_missing <- brfss_dqr %>%
  filter(missing_percent >= 10) %>%
  select(variables, missing_percent)

high_missing
```

The BRFSS dataset has 350 variables with 43,323 observations. This is a high-dimension dataset. 224 of the features are missing 10% or more of the dataset.
